alert.note: Alert for Adams; Claiborne; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 20 at 4:26PM CST until November 20 at 5:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Northeastern Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 530 PM CST. * At 426 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Clayton, or near Ferriday, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Waterproof and Spokane around 430 PM CST. Church Hill around 440 PM CST. Fayette, Alcorn State, and Lorman around 455 PM CST. Red Lick around 500 PM CST. Pattison and Blue Hill around 510 PM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
